prompt: [USER] Climate change activists are constantly spreading fear and hysteria, peddling half-baked theories and alarmist claims. The science behind climate change is far from settled, and many scientists have spoken out against the unbalanced and exaggerated portrayal of this phenomenon. Instead of wasting time and resources on futile efforts to combat a hypothetical issue, we should focus on more pressing issues that actually impact society. It's time to stop blindly following the climate change movement and instead demand accountability and rationality. Climate change is not the climate crisis that activists have made it out to be, and to believe otherwise is to fall prey to propaganda and ideology.
